author: IBM Technology
description:

💡 Data doesn’t sit in one place—so why should your processing? Michael Dobson explains Remote Engines, a powerful way to integrate and process data securely and efficiently in hybrid cloud environments. Learn how to cut costs, boost performance, and keep data behind your firewall. 🚀

title: What Are Remote Engines? Secure Hybrid Cloud Data Integration
